## Decision Log

[Populated during implementation with important decisions made]

**Format**:
```
[YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM] Decision description
Reason: [Why this choice was made]
Alternatives considered: [What else was considered]
Impact: [How this affects the project]
```

**Example**:
```
[2025-11-18 14:30] Used SQLModel instead of Pydantic BaseModel for Activity
Reason: Needed database table generation, not just validation
Alternatives considered: Pydantic with separate Alembic table definition
Impact: Simpler code, table auto-generated from model definition
```
